document_data.name: Death
document_data.mainbody: '''Death''' was a [[dread wraith]] who roamed the [[Lowerdark]] of the [[Underdark]] with its companions, the [[mummy]] [[Disease (mummy)|Disease]] and the [[undead]] [[beholder]] [[Jessek|Destruction]].
document_data.History:
[[Hamezaar]], the [[vampire]] ruler of the [[Boneyard (Earthroot)|Boneyard]], once worked to recruit Death, Disease, and Destruction to his undead armies, but they declined for lack of interest.

''Circa'' [[1372 DR]], the trio were searching for an [[annihilator]], intending to capture and control it with the aid of Destruction's ''[[charm monster]]'' eye-ray power. After they had an annihilator, Destruction wanted to hunt down and slay the outcast beholder [[Tobulux]] for being an abomination, as well as his [[illithid]] companion [[Ralayn]] who would oppose them.
